summary: The module defines a suite of serializer classes and a factory that convert a broad spectrum of Python and Django objects—including model fields, managers, migration operations, dates, times, decimals, regular expressions, enums, functions, partials, bytes, text, UUIDs, and various collection types—into simple, JSON‑compatible structures for use in Django's migration system.
business_intent: Provide a generic, extensible mechanism to deconstruct complex Python/Django objects into portable, serializable representations so that migration files can be generated, stored, and reapplied reliably across environments.
